findings.message:
Blacksmith.collectDust(address) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#825-839) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(treasury).transfer(amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#835)
findings.name: arbitrary-send

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Blacksmith.withdraw(address,uint256) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#718-736):
	External calls:
	- _claimCoverRewards(pool,miner) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#726)
		- cover.mint(msg.sender,minedSinceLastUpdate) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#899)
	- _claimBonus(bonusToken,miner) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#727)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#450)
		- token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,_amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#889)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
		- token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,balance) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#891)
	- _safeTransfer(_lpToken,_amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#734)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#450)
		- token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,_amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#889)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
		- token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,balance) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#891)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _claimBonus(bonusToken,miner) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#727)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
	- _safeTransfer(_lpToken,_amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#734)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _safeTransfer(_lpToken,_amount) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#734)
		- _status = _ENTERED (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#566)
		- _status = _NOT_ENTERED (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#572)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:

		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
		- token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,balance) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#891)

		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#370)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- miner.rewardWriteoff = miner.amount.mul(pool.accRewardsPerToken).div(CAL_MULTIPLIER) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#711)
	- miner.bonusWriteoff = miner.amount.mul(bonusToken.accBonusPerToken).div(CAL_MULTIPLIER) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#712)

findings.message:
Blacksmith.collectDust(address) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#825-839) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(pool.lastUpdatedAt == 0,Blacksmith: lpToken, not allowed) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#827)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Blacksmith.addBonusToken(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#789-822) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(currentBonusToken.addr).balanceOf(address(this)) == 0,Blacksmith: last bonus not all claimed) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#803)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Blacksmith.updatePool(address) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#655-674) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lpTotal == 0 (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#659)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:

	- totalWeight = totalWeight.add(_weight) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#769)

findings.message:

findings.message:
Blacksmith.updatePoolWeights(address[],uint256[]) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#750-758) should emit an event for: 
	- totalWeight = totalWeight.add(_weights[i]).sub(pool.weight) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#754)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
Blacksmith._claimBonus(IBlacksmith.BonusToken,IBlacksmith.Miner) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#904-911) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- bonusToken.totalBonus > 0 && miner.amount > 0 && bonusToken.startTime < block.timestamp (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#905)
	- bonusSinceLastUpdate > 0 (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#907)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Blacksmith.deposit(address,uint256) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#696-716) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= START_TIME,Blacksmith: not started) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#697)
	- require(bool,string)(pool.lastUpdatedAt > 0,Blacksmith: pool does not exists) (../..0xe0b94a7bb45dd905c79bb1992c9879f40f1caed5.sol#700)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
